pages.text: $(l:crafting/runic_shears)Runic Shears$() allow you to reach briefly between the realms, plucking from an otherworldly equivalent of an animal (or plant) a fey item.$(br2)Fey leather can be obtained from many creatures that drop leather when killed. A complete list of suitable entities can be found with $(sources:roots:fey_leather)JEI$().
